Politics.title: More than 10% of Congress won't return to their seats after 2026

Politics.title: Trump's economic approval at new low. And, Congress set to let ACA subsidies expire

Politics.title: GOP House Rep. says it's 'unacceptable' to allow ACA subsidies to expire

Politics.title: Trump's economic approval hits a new low at 36%, poll finds
